urls.title: Asset Performance Officer - 16461 - Environment Agency Jobs
urls.description: Title: Asset Performance Officer - 16461. Vacancy Id: 16461. Role Type: Engineering, Operational Delivery, Risk Management. Salary Range: 25,001 - 30,000 . Location: Gainsborough , Nottingham . Closing Date: 04/04/2021, 23:55

text:

"This role provides great variety, satisfaction and a real sense of achievement in preventing flooding to people, property and infrastructure"
